document.docAuthor: Chani-Posse, Mariana, Newton, Alfred F., Hansen, Aslak Kappel & Solodovnikov, Alexey
document.masterDocTitle: Checklist and taxonomic changes for Central and South American Philonthina (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist and taxonomic changes for Central and South American Philonthina (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae)

bibRefCitation.refString: Sharp, D. (1885) Staphylinidae. Biologia Centrali-Americana. Insecta. Coleoptera, 1 (2), 393 - 536. [http: // www. sil. si. edu / digitalcollections / bca /]

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Pescolinus
Sharp 1885 : 453
. Type species:
Pescolinus palmatus Sharp,1885
, by monotypy.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Note:
Pescolinus
is an endemic Neotropical genus with eight species known at present from Costa Rica and Panama; revision, phylogeny ( Chani-Posse 2014b ).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Pescolinus aeneus
Chani-Posse 2014b : 241
, attributed to Bierig MS . Type locality: Costa Rica , Vara Blanca. Type depository: FMNH HT ♂ , 5 PT. Distribution : Costa Rica
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Pescolinus cartagensis Chani-Posse 2014b
243. Type locality: Costa Rica
:
Cartago , P.N. Tapanti ,
1150 m
, 9°45′41″N 83°47′5″W . Type depository: SEMC HT ♀ . Distribution : Costa Rica
.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Pescolinus costaricensis
Chani-Posse 2014b : 243
. Type locality: San Isidro Lebstrella , Costa Rica
.
Type depository: FMNH HT ♂ ; SEMC 1 PT. Distribution : Costa Rica
.

Pescolinus montanus
Chani-Posse 2014b : 244
, attributed to Bierig MS . Type locality: Costa Rica , Vara Blanca. Type depository: FMNH HT ♂ , 6 PT. Distribution : Costa Rica
.

Pescolinus moyae
Chani-Posse 2014b : 245
, attributed to Bierig MS . Type locality: Costa Rica
:
San José Prov.,
2.4km ENE Sn Gerardo de Rivas
, Cloudbridge Reserve , River Trail ,
2000–2200 m
, 9°28.07′ N , 83°33.88′ W . Type depository: SEMC HT ♀
;
FMNH 1 PT. Distribution : Costa Rica . Note: Bierig originally placed in
Linoderus
.

bibRefCitation.refString: Sharp, D. (1885) Staphylinidae. Biologia Centrali-Americana. Insecta. Coleoptera, 1 (2), 393 - 536. [http: // www. sil. si. edu / digitalcollections / bca /]

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Pescolinus palmatus
Sharp 1885 : 453
. Type locality:
Panama
, Volcan de Chiriqui , 4000–6000 ft . Type depository: BMNH LT ♂ , FMNH 1 PLT . Notes: lectotype designation,
Panama
, redescription, distribution (
Chani-Posse 2014b: 246
).

bibRefCitation.refString: Bierig, A. (1937) Nuevos Staphylinini Neotropicales. Memorias de la Sociedad Cubana de Historia Natural " Felipe Poey ", 11, 191 - 205.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Pescolinus schmidti
Bierig 1937 : 193
. Type locality: Costa Rica : Vara Blanca ,
2000m
.
Type depository: FMNH HT ♀ . Distribution : Costa Rica . Notes: redescription, distribution ( Chani-Posse 2014: 247).

Pescolinus varablanquesis
Chani-Posse 2014b : 245
, attributed to Bierig MS . Type locality: Vara Blanca , Costa Rica
.
Type depository: FMNH HT ♂ , 2 PT. Distribution : Costa Rica . Note: Bierig original spelling “ varablanquensis ”, placed in
Linoderus
.
